title: (x) "A World of Presidia" Book Title/Header Typeface - SNV {Florian}
content:
Anyone recognize this DIN/Interstate-meets-Garage-like typeface? It appears in "A World of Presidia" by Slow Food Editore (Italy, 2005) paired with Frutiger.

Thanks for your help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/presidia_titles_4006.jpg)
author: cwongyap

comments.content:
Hi Christine,  
that would be [SNV](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122330/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/snv/?testdrive=dock%3Dfalse%26size%3D71%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DA%2520World%2520of%2520Presidia%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dfit%26seed%3D15?refby=mfde), a Swiss road signage typeface. See more of it on [Ralf Herrmann’s Flickr stream](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015122330/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/ralf_herrmann/tags/snv/).  
F
